48 template< typename T >
49 chaos::uni::UTF8String int_to_binary( T value, bool zero_pad = true )
50 {
51  // returned string which will hold the binary result
52  chaos::uni::UTF8String u( "0b" );
53 
54  std::size_t bit_count = sizeof( T ) * 8;
55  // use bitwise mask to evaluate whether each bit is a one or a zero
56  // chaos::uint64 mask = 1 << ( bit_count - 1 );
57  chaos::uint64 v = static_cast< chaos::uint64 >( value );
58  bool non_zero_found = false;
59  for ( std::size_t i = 0; i < bit_count; ++i )
60  {
61  chaos::uint64 mask = 1ULL << ( bit_count - 1 - i );
62 
63  if ( ( v & mask ) == 0 )
64  {
65  if( zero_pad || non_zero_found || i == bit_count - 1 )
66  {
67  u << "0";
68  }
69  }
70  else
71  {
72  non_zero_found = true;
73  u << "1";
74  }
75  }
76 
77  return u;
78 }

100 template< typename T >
101 chaos::uni::UTF8String int_to_hex( T value, bool zero_pad = true )
102 {
103  std::stringstream ss;
104  ss << "0x";
105  if ( zero_pad )

108  }
109  ss << std::uppercase << std::hex << value;
110 
111  return chaos::uni::UTF8String( ss.str().c_str() );
112 }
